div.p: Easily embed logos in your app

div.class: callout my-4 px-5 py-4 overflow-hidden rounded-2xl flex gap-3 border border-sky-500/20 bg-sky-50/50 dark:border-sky-500/30 dark:bg-sky-500/10
text-sm prose min-w-0 w-full text-sky-900 dark:text-sky-200
div.p: Logo Link is free to use and we don’t ask for any attribution.
We offer a fair use rate limit of 1,000,000 requests per month, which is designed to cover most small to medium applications.
If your usage approaches this limit, we’ll send you a friendly heads-up so you can adjust your usage or explore an upgrade to an unlimited tier.

For enterprises, we provide custom solutions, including SLA agreements, custom terms, and flexible caching options to ensure optimal performance at scale. These plans are tailored to meet the needs of high-volume users.
Feel free to contact us to discuss the right plan for your use case.

a.class: -ml-10 flex items-center opacity-0 border-0 group-hover:opacity-100

div.class: callout my-4 px-5 py-4 overflow-hidden rounded-2xl flex gap-3 border border-sky-500/20 bg-sky-50/50 dark:border-sky-500/30 dark:bg-sky-500/10
text-sm prose min-w-0 w-full text-sky-900 dark:text-sky-200

div.div: Every request must include your unique clientId.

div.p: To use Logo Link, you must include your clientId with every request. Adding your clientId provides reliable access, supports fair usage, and keeps consistent performance across all requests.

p.strong: How to get your client ID:

li.p: Register as a developer: Create a free account and access your clientId from the developer portal.
Authenticate your requests: Include your clientId in each request as shown in the example below:

div.class: code-block mt-5 mb-8 not-prose rounded-2xl relative group text-gray-950 dark:text-gray-50 codeblock-light border border-gray-950/10 dark:border-white/10 bg-transparent dark:bg-transparent
absolute top-3 right-4 flex items-center gap-1.5

button.class: h-[26px] w-[26px] flex items-center justify-center rounded-md backdrop-blur peer group/copy-button
button.aria-label: Copy the contents from the code block

button.class: h-[26px] w-[26px] flex items-center justify-center rounded-md backdrop-blur peer group/ask-ai-button

div.class: absolute top-11 left-1/2 transform whitespace-nowrap -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 peer-hover:opacity-100 opacity-0 text-white rounded-lg px-1.5 py-0.5 text-xs bg-primary-dark

w-0 min-w-full max-w-full py-3.5 px-4 h-full dark:bg-codeblock relative text-sm leading-6 children:!my-0 children:!shadow-none children:!bg-transparent transition-[height] duration-300 ease-in-out [&_*]:ring-0 [&_*]:outline-none [&_*]:focus:ring-0 [&_*]:focus:outline-none [&_pre>code]:pr-[3rem] [&_pre>code>span.line-highlight]:min-w-[calc(100%+3rem)] [&_pre>code>span.line-diff]:min-w-[calc(100%+3rem)] rounded-2xl bg-white overflow-x-auto scrollbar-thin scrollbar-thumb-rounded scrollbar-thumb-black/15 hover:scrollbar-thumb-black/20 active:scrollbar-thumb-black/20 dark:scrollbar-thumb-white/20 dark:hover:scrollbar-thumb-white/25 dark:active:scrollbar-thumb-white/25

div.class: callout my-4 px-5 py-4 overflow-hidden rounded-2xl flex gap-3 border border-sky-500/20 bg-sky-50/50 dark:border-sky-500/30 dark:bg-sky-500/10
text-sm prose min-w-0 w-full text-sky-900 dark:text-sky-200

div.div: We require Logo Link to be directly embedded in your applications.

div.p: Embedding Logo Link directly within your HTML image tags guarantees that the logo remains up-to-date at all times. It also ensures a faster and more reliable implementation. See our uptime.

div.class: code-block mt-5 mb-8 not-prose rounded-2xl relative group text-gray-950 dark:text-gray-50 codeblock-light border border-gray-950/10 dark:border-white/10 bg-transparent dark:bg-transparent
absolute top-3 right-4 flex items-center gap-1.5

button.class: h-[26px] w-[26px] flex items-center justify-center rounded-md backdrop-blur peer group/copy-button
button.aria-label: Copy the contents from the code block

div.class: absolute top-11 left-1/2 transform whitespace-nowrap -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 peer-hover:opacity-100 opacity-0 text-white rounded-lg px-1.5 py-0.5 text-xs bg-primary-dark

button.class: h-[26px] w-[26px] flex items-center justify-center rounded-md backdrop-blur peer group/ask-ai-button

div.class: absolute top-11 left-1/2 transform whitespace-nowrap -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 peer-hover:opacity-100 opacity-0 text-white rounded-lg px-1.5 py-0.5 text-xs bg-primary-dark

w-0 min-w-full max-w-full py-3.5 px-4 h-full dark:bg-codeblock relative text-sm leading-6 children:!my-0 children:!shadow-none children:!bg-transparent transition-[height] duration-300 ease-in-out [&_*]:ring-0 [&_*]:outline-none [&_*]:focus:ring-0 [&_*]:focus:outline-none [&_pre>code]:pr-[3rem] [&_pre>code>span.line-highlight]:min-w-[calc(100%+3rem)] [&_pre>code>span.line-diff]:min-w-[calc(100%+3rem)] rounded-2xl bg-white overflow-x-auto scrollbar-thin scrollbar-thumb-rounded scrollbar-thumb-black/15 hover:scrollbar-thumb-black/20 active:scrollbar-thumb-black/20 dark:scrollbar-thumb-white/20 dark:hover:scrollbar-thumb-white/25 dark:active:scrollbar-thumb-white/25

div.p: 👉 When embedding Logo Link, HTTP requests must include the Referer header with the request origin. Your HTTP Referrer-Policy header must be set to one of: origin, origin-when-cross-origin, strict-origin, strict-origin-when-cross-origin (browser default), or unsafe-url.
⚠️ Programmatic access to logo images is not permitted and may result in rate limiting or blocking. Scraping logos will also lead to a block.
If your use case requires caching, please contact us for a custom setup.

a.class: -ml-10 flex items-center opacity-0 border-0 group-hover:opacity-100

div.class: callout my-4 px-5 py-4 overflow-hidden rounded-2xl flex gap-3 border border-sky-500/20 bg-sky-50/50 dark:border-sky-500/30 dark:bg-sky-500/10
text-sm prose min-w-0 w-full text-sky-900 dark:text-sky-200

div.div: You cannot replicate the core user experience of Brandfetch.

div.p: he best way to ensure that your application doesn’t violate this guideline is by integrating Brandfetch into an existing app that offers more value than just the Brandfetch integration.

ul.li: ✅ The Typeform integration improves the user’s onboarding by presenting brand logos. Without this integration, the app still has a lot of value to its users.
✅ The Pitch integration brings brand logos inside Pitch’s editor to streamline the creation of presentations. Without this integration, the app still has a lot of value to its users.
🚫 A logo search that only returns logos from Logo Link. Without the integration, the app has no content and no value to users.
🚫 An unofficial Logo API that allows users to access brand logos via Logo Link. Without the API, the app has no content and no value to users.

div.p: If you’re unsure about your use case, please contact us.

p.em: Logos are the property of their respective trademark owners. Logo usage must comply with the principles of “fair use,” which allow referencing a brand without endorsement, misrepresentation, or alteration. If you’re unsure, consult a legal professional.
